name: Magnitude
long_description:
Magnitude is the open-source, vision-first browser agent. 

It interacts with the browser much like a human would. Itâ€™s accurate, reliable, and fully customizable, enabling real production usage.

You can use it to automate tasks on the web, intelligently extract data, test your web apps, or as a building block for your own browser agents.

We recently achieved a state-of-the-art 94% success rate on the WebVoyager benchmark, beating all other browser agents.
